result.value: CellRank: dynamics from multi-view single-cell data

result.original_header: CellRank 2: Unified fate mapping in multiview single-cell data
result.value:
**CellRank** is a modular framework to study cellular dynamics based on Markov state modeling of
multi-view single-cell data. See our `documentation`_, and the `CellRank 1`_ and `CellRank 2 manuscript`_ to learn more. 
CellRank scales to large cell numbers, is fully compatible with the `scverse`_ ecosystem, and easy to use.
In the backend, it is powered by `pyGPCCA`_ (`Reuter et al. (2018)`_). Feel
free to open an `issue`_ if you encounter a bug, need our help or just want to make a comment/suggestion.

- Estimate differentiation direction based on a varied number of biological priors, including RNA velocity
  (`La Manno et al. (2018)`_, `Bergen et al. (2020)`_), any pseudotime or developmental potential,
  experimental time points, metabolic labels, and more.
- Compute initial, terminal and intermediate macrostates.
- Infer fate probabilities and driver genes.
- Visualize and cluster gene expression trends.
- ... and much more, check out our `documentation`_.
CellRank 2: Unified fate mapping in multiview single-cell data

bioinformatics, cell-fate-determination, cell-fate-transitions, data-science, fuzzy-clustering-analyses, genetics, machine-learning, manifold-learning, markov-chains, rna-velocity, single-cell-genomics, single-cell-rna-seq, trajectory-generation

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Use `toarray()` instead of `.A` by @michalk8 in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1214
* Update cellrank 2 paper citation by @mxposed in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1217
* Update references by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1219
* Fix adata copy (coarse transition matrix) by @michalk8 in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1223

## New Contributors
* @mxposed made their first contribution in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1217

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/compare/v2.0.5...v2.0.6
result.name: v2.0.6

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Remove matplotlib upper pin from by @michalk8 in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1143
* Update issue templates by @Marius1311 in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1156
* Update `.gitignore` by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1164
* Update `heatmap` by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1162
* Update `heatmap` by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1160
* Add TSI score code by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1166
* Update `pyproject` by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1172
* Add CBC score by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1168
* Fix/tsi unsetting by @michalk8 in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1174
* Update pyGAM link function by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1175
* Update state plotting by @WeilerP in https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/pull/1177


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theislab/cellrank/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3
